mapper.insert: insert into pay(pay_imp_uid, pay_merchant_uid, pay_pg, pay_method, pay_name, pay_name_type, pay_amount, member_num, member_email, member_name, member_phone_num, member_address, pay_status) value(#{payImpUid}, #{payMerchantUid}, #{payPg}, #{payMethod}, #{payName}, #{payNameType}, #{payAmount}, #{memberNum}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhoneNum}, #{memberAddress}, '결제완료')

insert into refund(refund_imp_uid, pay_merchant_uid, refund_reason, refund_name, refund_amount, refund_type, refund_name_type) value (#{refundImpUid}, #{payMerchantUid}, #{refundReason}, #{refundName}, #{refundAmount}, #{refundType}, #{refundNameType})
mapper.update: update pay set pay_status = '결제취소' where pay_imp_uid = #{payImpUid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from pay where pay_merchant_uid = #{payMerchantUid} and pay_status = '결제취소';
